entities.name: harry
entities.description: The main character of the story, who is trying to catch the Snitch.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: A friend of Harry's who helps him decipher the message on the Snitch.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: Another friend of Harry's who is also trying to understand the message on the Snitch.

entities.name: dumbledore
entities.description: A wise and powerful wizard who wrote the message on the Snitch.

entities.name: snitch
entities.description: A golden sphere that Harry is trying to catch, which has a mysterious message engraved on it.

relationships.description: Harry is trying to catch the Snitch.
Hermione helps Harry decipher the message on the Snitch.
Ron also helps Harry understand the message on the Snitch.
Dumbledore wrote the mysterious message on the Snitch.
